data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Nikšic, Montenegro.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nikšic, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Nikšic, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Nikšic, Montenegro.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Nikšic, Montenegro.
Spirit, I pray that the Egyptian, Balkan people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 68,800 people living in Nikšic through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Nikšic, Montenegro and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nikšic, Montenegro has a population of 68,800.

We estimate Nikšic has 182 people who might know Jesus, 50,909 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,709 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 378 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 182 believers in Nikšic and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.
